Título: SECOND CONSECUTIVE FAIL OF G10-B11 FLOW SWITCH
Descripción: Flow switch G10-B11 has detected, twice consecutive, that the air/oil mix is not circulating throug the pipe (5+6). NOTE: we recommend to replace the filters periodically.

Preguntas.Texto: 1. Has alarm 846 or 969 (Air pressure or lubrication oil failure) appeared previously?
2. Has the alarm 970 (1st Fail lubrication of bearings / gears) appeared previously?

Respuestas.Mensaje: Check in the LOGBOOK that alarm 970 has actually appeared. Check alarm 970.
